ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/22/99 12:07:18 PM Central Daylight Time, jtscott@bellsouth.net writes: Woh woh.. hehe I didn t want us to start attacking IRL habits.  I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/22/99 12:07:18 PM Central Daylight Time,
jtscott@... writes:

Woh woh.. hehe I didn't want us to start attacking IRL habits. I see what
he's saying about not giving people buffs just because they don't want them.
But I also see where RPing your character is to give him all of the buffs.
Perhaps your character is the ultimate giver. Always helping even when
people don't want it. Do you remember your mother helping you clean your
room even though you didn't want it? Well, maybe some characters are like
that. Just a thought.


Nofur<Pact of Aegis> of the 16th rank on Karana



<< No immature is when you give a player all your buffs just becuase they
wanted to RP and didn't want your help and yes it does ruin the Rping
enviroment. And we are not going ot turn this into some kind of blown out
argument just becuase you think that my life is this game. >>
